    #include <stdio.h>
     
    int main(){
    	int i, n, sum = 0, a[100], ans = 0, k = 1; 
    	while(1){
    	scanf("%d", &n);
    	if(n==0) break;
    	sum = ans = 0;
    	for(i=0; i<n; i++){
    		scanf("%d", &a[i]);
    		sum+=a[i];
    	}
    	sum/=n;
    	for(i=0; i<n; i++){
    		if(sum>a[i]) ans += (sum-a[i]);
    		else ans += (a[i]-sum);
    	}
    	printf("Set #%d\nThe minimum number of moves is %d.\n\n",k, ans/2);
    	k++;
    	}
    	return 0;
    }
